entry.title: I'M GAY!!
entry.summary:
Author: harixxdiaz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,030Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Summary: “Why did you call me then?” Maddie says, confused.“I think I'm in love with your brother.”And that’s how Eddie ended up in Maddie’s kitchen a few days after him and Chris came back.“So.” Maddie says, pouring a glass of wine for Eddie.“So.. What’s up?” Eddie says.“Eddie, you called me and told me you’re in love with my brother. That’s what's up.” She says in a stern tone. Eddie gets outted by a four year old.

entry.title: With Great Fire
entry.summary:
Author: Taylorm1509

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,368Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Evan Buckley didn’t break bones the way other kids did. He learned that in eighth grade, when he fell off the roof of the gym during a dumb dare from Flash Thompson. Landed on the concrete. Hard. Everyone thought he’d shattered something. He got up. Winded. Bruised. No break. Not even a sprain. The nurse said he was lucky. Buck knew better.He didn’t feel lucky. He felt wrong. Like there was a blueprint for how a person was supposed to work, and he’d been printed just slightly off-axis. Because it wasn’t the first time.ORAn AU where Buck is the Spider-Man of this universe. Getting his powers as his parents were desperate to heal Daniel, they sought help beyond conventional medicine. An experimental treatment that might jumpstart Daniel’s immune system through enhanced gene therapy using a matched donor’s stem cells. Create a sibling. A perfect donor child, whose DNA could be pre-modified to produce regenerative stem cells and enhanced immunity. Buck was this perfect donor child.Buck has to learn how to juggle his responsibilities as Spider-Man whilst still being a firefighter at the 118. People start to catch on.

entry.title: Cowboys say it out loud
entry.summary:
Author: Ksrkas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,070Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 141

Summary: After moving in to the house on South Bedford Street, Buck starts to panic about not being able to smell Eddie anymore, which leads to a spontaneous trip down to Eddie's rural ranch in El Paso.Eddie manages to get Buck to squeeze into a pair of his Wrangler jeans, for a night out at a bar. It's tradition after all.Alcohol flows, seeing Eddie master the mechanical bull gets Buck all hot and heavy and Bucks isn't as bad at line dancing as expected.At some point during the evening, Eddie settles his cowboy hat on top of Buck's head, who apparently hasn't heard of the rule "Wear the hat, ride the cowboy"But oh boy does he ride...

entry.title: My Beloved Ghost and Me.
entry.summary:
Author: daggerandrosie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,449Chapters: 13/17Kudos: 37

Summary: “Listen Buckley, I need you to know that this whole…” The officer gestured to his' clothes. “Gothics United Against Following Curfew club you're a part of can end up real bad, you can die kid. Or worse, go to jail.”Buck doesn't think he looks much like a goth, aside from wearing black, and he only does it because it's easier to sneak around like that, there's nothing about him… Scratch that. Officer Gallagher just found him lurking around the cemetery at two in the morning. Because he talks to ghosts.Always have and probably always will.It fucking sucks.It sucks. so. bad.And now he has one. A ghost. In his room. A very handsome one at that, an old cowboy with a cowboy hat, tight pants, boots and big brown eyes.Buck is so, so, very fucked

entry.title: Reasons, Seasons, and Lifetimes
entry.summary:
Author: curlsmustaches

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,924Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: “Okay. That is a beautiful man”.Chim was wrong. “Beautiful” just doesn’t cover what Eddie Diaz was.Seeing Eddie Diaz felt like being hit by a tsunami and coming up for air all at the same time.Buck searched for the sunlight and chased it as he neared the surface. Eddie was the sun. He didn’t know he was approaching it, but as he was laying his eyes on this tall, muscular piece of art, the water surface tension was broken. Buck wasn’t sure if his gasp was imagined or real, but goddamn did he have to catch his breath.This man was either going to kill him or bring him back to life. Buck had been living in some sort of limbo his entire life. Meeting Eddie Diaz was arriving at a crossroads.Which side of the ledge would he fall down?ORan enemies-friends-fwb-estranged-lovers multi chapter fic.

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,996Chapters: 19/23Kudos: 385

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth… then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it’s his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3 Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don’t read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.title: One Thing Led to Love
entry.summary:
Author: mostly_luminous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,993Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 11

Summary: Eddie’s voice came low. “What are you saying?”Buck backed away another step, like he could physically put distance between himself and that truth.“I can’t do this,” he muttered, voice cracking. “I can’t stand here and explain to you how it felt when you touched me like I was something you wanted. When you made me believe that maybe... maybe we were finally on the same page.”“Buck–”“No,” Buck said quickly, shaking his head, the pressure finally breaking in his voice. “You forgot. You forgot everything. And I…I’ve been walking around like it was this giant, irreversible thing between us and you didn’t even know it happened.”-Summary: Eddie and Christopher are finally back in L.A. Bobby retired. Henrieta appointed as the new captain. Chimney and Maddie welcome their new baby girl. And Buck is out to have fun with Ravi, trying to find a new connection and give his heart another chance after his heartbreak with Tommy.or, Eddie got a call on one of Buck’s nights out with Ravi. They got too drunk, then one thing led to another…. or more.

entry.title: locked in here forever (and just can't say goodbye)
entry.summary:
Author: freddiefakemanlover

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,546Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 43

Summary: He keeps ending up at the bar. And then he keeps ending up in strangers beds, hands roaming over his skin, mind fogged up and blissfully empty, searching and searching for a contentment he knows he’ll never find there. After, sometimes he’ll stand in the shower and scrub at his skin until it’s pink, but he can never really get rid of the feeling of hands all over him, crawling into his skin. Other times he can barely stand to be under the water, mind flashing back to being stuck in a raging flood, unable to breathe. (He ends up going to the bar again that night.) or,Post-lawsuit, Buck spirals.

entry.title: The Program
entry.summary:
Author: deancasandthemoose

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,152Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 28

Summary: Buck works as a support submissive, a re-entry resource for dominants who get released from prison. Support subs live with their dominants and cook and clean and generally service their dominants to help them re-acclimate to society.Buck is good at his job, so he usually gets assigned to higher risk cases. He’s had absolutely no problem staying professional.He’s sure that Eddie Diaz, convicted murderer, is going to be absolutely no different.

entry.title: Make my wish come true (All I want for Christmas It’s you)
entry.summary:
Author: Salve_El_Atun

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,440Chapters: 11/17Kudos: 30

Summary: Christopher believes in magic, his dads had always encouraged him to make wishes and follow his dreams, but... What if the dreams he has are about the same person? What if he's been away most of his life? What if it's his voice that encourages him to make that wish to the star that nightly perches outside his window?"Make my wish come true," his grey eyes watered slightly, making them look even brighter in the moonlight. "All I want for Christmas is him."

entry.title: Embers Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,202Chapters: 9/12Kudos: 286

Summary: The picture on the back is a dark tree line contrasted by the wide blue sky above it. ‘GEORGIA’ is written in big white letters across the top, the bottom saying “Welcome to Adventure.” It’s faded, like it has taken one too many trips in the back of a mail truck, tattered and worn.Eddie flips it over, the back scrawled with quick but somewhat neat handwriting—something personal. Scanning the words his eyes drop to the corner—the address.‘Maddie Kendall, 1500 Hemlock Ave, Hershey, PA 17033’What the hell?Or,An AU where Buck's postcards, which he sent to Maddie, were forwarded to Eddie on deployment by mistake through a Military Outreach Program. They become a reason for Eddie to hold on through the dark times, becoming attached to the man behind the letters and his stories of his travels. Until Buck's letters start getting sadder, wondering why his sister won't reply to him.

entry.title: are you hungry for me, baby?
entry.summary:
Author: rasberrybush

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,948Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 65

Summary: ———Eddie's first coherent thought is, ridiculously: Where has he been storing that thing? Under the bed? In the back of the closet? Something that big, Eddie would have been paranoid about someone finding it. They have a kid in the house! Not that Buck isn't allowed to own a sex toy. Eddie's not a prude he just—wow, that thing is big, and Buck is pumping it in and out of himself with a practiced confidence that's scrambling Eddie's brains and igniting a fire of jealousy so hot and bright in his gut that he doesn't know what to do with it.He should stop watching, stop staring, transfixed, by the regular rhythm of it: in and out and in and out, slow, teasing, a twist in his wrist for every push and pull.———Eddie & Buck in their roommates era and Eddie walks in on Buck ten inches deep. They fuck nasty about it.
